metadata.title: CVE-2012-0880 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: Apache Xerces-C++ allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted message sent to an XML service that causes hash table collisions.

notes.note: mikesalvatore> No fix could be found as of 2018-10-24. rodrigo-zaiden> still no upstream fix available as of 2022-10-24

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-10-24').
